In a press release sent out this morning the State College Police Department and Pennsylvania State Police announced the arrest of a North Carolina man after the discovery of a methamphetamine lab in his motel room PERIOD

After investigating a report of suspicious activity at a motel room on  S PERIOD Atherton St PERIOD last night police arrested 40yearold Lee Caughron of Gibsonville N.C PERIOD When police searched the motel room they found remnants of an inoperative portable methamphetamine lab PERIOD

Caughron was arrested on felony possession of marijuana with intent to deliver and unlawfully possessing a . caliber handgun PERIOD

The Pennsylvania State Police Clandestine Laboratory Response Team has been summoned to clean up the site and the motel room has been secured PERIOD At this time the room does not pose any explosive hazard according to the press release PERIOD

Caughron was arrainged before Magisterial District Judge Allen Sinclair and is in the Centre County Correctional Facility with a bail of  according to the press release PERIOD
